venue.address_1: 107 South St, Ste 6A (btw South Station & Chinatown)
venue.name: David Buck's Loft

item.description:
Wow, another wonderful year to wrap up...

We look forward to this fun event where we eat, pLay & love...Celebrating You and Us!!

Come share "shamelessly" what you HAVE deliberately manifested this year... or in the process of manifesting. We want to CELEBRATE with you.

(1) Please wear comfy clothes that allows you to sit comfortably on the floor. Be ready to move, dance, sing. laugh & simply have fun!

(2) Please come to share at least 1 thing that have helped you stay aligned & inspired in your journey of living a more fulfilled & joyous life in 2010.
(e.g. a poem, an affirmation, a song, guided meditation, book reference)

(3) Bring a favorite MAIN ENTREE to share. We will provide the desserts & refreshments. You're welcome to bring wine too (as an extra to share).

We are very thankful that we have deliberately attracted you wonderful folks into our lives this year.

much JOY!
ChewHoong & Dave

***************************************************************
For parking and directions (via T or driving) info to Dave's loft :
(1) Go here: http://www.meetup.com...
(2) Sign in
(3) Scroll down & open file "Directions & Parking_BostonLOA Meetup"

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Celebrating You and Us!!
